attributes.action: Say no to vaccine passports and all other limitations on people's freedoms .
attributes.additional_details: I believe that it makes no sense as the whole world has had covid not just us also I thought it was a free country
attributes.background: Throw out all vaccine limitations as it is wrong .Full stop

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
